title: OpenType 1.5 draft spec & 1.6 suggestions
content:
Adobe and Microsoft just posted a notice on the OpenType mailing list about a draft of version 1.5 of the OpenType spec, and requesting suggestions/proposals for version 1.6.

If you’re interested in the mailing list:  
subscribe: [opentype-migration-sub@indx.co.uk](mailto:opentype-migration-sub@indx.co.uk)

More details on my blog here: [http://blogs.adobe.com/typblography/2008/01/opentype\_15\_draft.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20080304034623/http:/blogs.adobe.com/typblography/2008/01/opentype_15_draft.html "http://blogs.adobe.com/typblography/2008/01/opentype\_15\_draft.html")

Cheers,

T
